body:
It seems there are similar issues in some X11 components as those of  #5936
On spack install libxtst

Package 'fixesproto', required by 'xfixes', not found


On spack install xdpyinfo:

Package 'recordproto', required by 'xtst', not found
Package 'inputproto', required by 'xi', not found
title: Errors in X11 stuff missing some "proto" like  closed  #5936
